entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 9 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 9 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
